DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety fesoterodine comparison tolterodine placebo overactive bladder
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety Fesoterodine Comparison Tolterodine Overactive Bladder ( OAB )
DOC.criteria: Adult overactive bladder ( OAB ) patient present OAB symptom , include urinary frequency > = 8 per day urgency urinary incontinence > =1 per day Patients condition would contraindicate fesoterodine use , e.g , hypersensitivity active substance ( fesoterodine ) peanut soya excipients , urinary retention , gastric retention . Patients significant hepatic renal disease significant unstable disease . OAB symptom cause neurological condition , know pathology urinary tract , etc .
